attributes.action: Stop adverts featuring children with makeup and "adult" clothing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For some time, adverts featuring children, such as toy adverts, show children dressed in clothing that should only really be worn by adults.  They also wear makeup.  Children are being "forced" into growing up sooner and this is part of the problem.  Put an end to it and let children grow up when they are ready to.
